languages.text: "Мастер артефактов? Звучит интересно. Что, если я готов{mf||а} обменять Ардженту на одно из твоих творений?"

traits.locale_text: "Мастер артефактов? Звучит интересно. Что, если я готов{mf||а} обменять Ардженту на одно из твоих творений?"

languages.text: "Arch-artificer, you say? I am intrigued. What would you say if I were to offer you Argenta in exchange for one of your creations?"
languages.original_text: "Мастер артефактов? Звучит интересно. Что, если я готов{mf||а} обменять Ардженту на одно из твоих творений?"

traits.locale_text: "Arch-artificer, you say? I am intrigued. What would you say if I were to offer you Argenta in exchange for one of your creations?"
"Arch-artificer, you say? I am intrigued. What would you say if I were to offer you Argenta in exchange for one of your creations?"
"Arch-artificer, you say? I am intrigued. What would you say if I were to offer you Argenta in exchange for one of your creations?"
"Arch-artificer, you say? I am intrigued. What would you say if I were to offer you Argenta in exchange for one of your creations?"
"Arch-artificer, you say? I am intrigued. What would you say if I were to offer you Argenta in exchange for one of your creations?"

languages.text: 「アーク・アーティファイサー？興味がそそられるな。お前の作品一つとアルジェンタを交換すると言ったらどうする？」
languages.original_text: "Arch-artificer, you say? I am intrigued. What would you say if I were to offer you Argenta in exchange for one of your creations?"

traits.locale_text: 「アーク・アーティファイサー？興味がそそられるな。お前の作品一つとアルジェンタを交換すると言ったらどうする？」

languages.text: “你说你是首席造物大师，是吗？我对你很感兴趣。如果我提议把阿洁塔交给你，交换你的造物，你觉得怎么样？”
languages.original_text: "Arch-artificer, you say? I am intrigued. What would you say if I were to offer you Argenta in exchange for one of your creations?"

traits.locale_text: “你说你是首席造物大师，是吗？我对你很感兴趣。如果我提议把阿洁塔交给你，交换你的造物，你觉得怎么样？”

languages.text: « Un archi-artificier ? Voilà qui est intéressant. Que diriez-vous si je vous échangeais Argenta contre l'une de vos créations ? »
languages.original_text: "Arch-artificer, you say? I am intrigued. What would you say if I were to offer you Argenta in exchange for one of your creations?"

traits.locale_text: « Un archi-artificier ? Voilà qui est intéressant. Que diriez-vous si je vous échangeais Argenta contre l'une de vos créations ? »

languages.text: «¿Archiartífice, dices? Interesante. ¿Y si te ofrezco a Argenta a cambio de una de tus creaciones?».
languages.original_text: "Arch-artificer, you say? I am intrigued. What would you say if I were to offer you Argenta in exchange for one of your creations?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Archiartífice, dices? Interesante. ¿Y si te ofrezco a Argenta a cambio de una de tus creaciones?».

languages.text: "Erz-Erbauer, sagt Ihr? Das ist interessant. Was würdet Ihr sagen, wenn ich Euch Argenta im Austausch für eine Eurer Schöpfungen anböte?"
languages.original_text: "Arch-artificer, you say? I am intrigued. What would you say if I were to offer you Argenta in exchange for one of your creations?"

traits.locale_text: "Erz-Erbauer, sagt Ihr? Das ist interessant. Was würdet Ihr sagen, wenn ich Euch Argenta im Austausch für eine Eurer Schöpfungen anböte?"

languages.text: "Başzanaatçı mı dedin? İşte şimdi ilgimi çektin. Eserlerinden birisi karşılığında sana Argenta'yı teslim etsem... Kabul eder misin?"
languages.original_text: "Arch-artificer, you say? I am intrigued. What would you say if I were to offer you Argenta in exchange for one of your creations?"

traits.locale_text: "Baş zanaatkâr mı dedin? İşte şimdi ilgimi çektin. Eserlerinden birisi karşılığında sana Argenta'yı teslim etsem... Kabul eder misin?"
